description.en: This mystical broom was used by Rhisis to sweep some autumn leaves.
description.ar: This mystical broom was used by Rhisis to sweep some autumn leaves.
description.br: Esta vassoura mística foi usada por Rhisis para varrer algumas folhas de outono.
description.cns: 这个神秘的扫帚被莱斯神用来清扫一些秋天的落叶。
description.de: Mit diesem Besen hat Rhisis einst die Herbstblätter weggefegt. Man kann aber auch auf ihm fliegen.
description.fi: This mystical broom was used by Rhisis to sweep some autumn leaves.
description.fil: This mystical broom was used by Rhisis to sweep some autumn leaves.
description.fr: Je suis en retard ! En retard ! En retard !
description.id: Sapu mistis ini digunakan oleh Rhisis untuk menyapu beberapa daun di musim gugur.
description.it: This mystical broom was used by Rhisis to sweep some autumn leaves.
description.jp: この神秘的なほうきは、紅葉を掃くためにリシスによって使用されました。
description.kr: 이 신비로운 빗자루는 리시스가 단풍을 쓸 때 사용했습니다.
description.nl: This mystical broom was used by Rhisis to sweep some autumn leaves.
description.pl: This mystical broom was used by Rhisis to sweep some autumn leaves.
description.ru: This mystical broom was used by Rhisis to sweep some autumn leaves.
description.sp: Esta escoba mística fue utilizada por Rhisis para barrer algunas hojas de otoño.
description.sw: This mystical broom was used by Rhisis to sweep some autumn leaves.
description.th: Rhisis ใช้ไม้กวาดลึกลับนี้เพื่อกวาดใบไม้ในฤดูใบไม้ร่วง
description.tw: 這把神秘的掃帚被黎席斯用來掃過一些秋葉。
description.vi: Cây chổi thần bí này đã được Rhisis sử dụng để quét một số chiếc lá mùa thu.
